title: 3 Thanksgiving Potato Recipes That Are Better Than Mashed
description: With a bigger, fluffier take on hash browns, a lighter gratin and a twist on twice-baked, Claire Saffitz makes the holiday staple shine in new ways.
dc:creator: Claire Saffitz
